DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the drug interaction between fostamatinib and rifampicin by comparing the safety, tolerability and plasma concentration of fostamatinib when administered alone and with rifampicin in healthy subjects
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Administration of Fostamatinib on Blood Concentrations of Rifampicin in Healthy Subjects.
DOC.criteria: Provision of informed consent prior to any study specific procedures Males or females aged 18 to 55 years (inclusive) Minimum weight of 50 kg and a body mass index (BMI) of 18 to 35 kg/m2 (inclusive) Female subjects must have a negative pregnancy test at screening and admission of each treatment period, must not be lactating, and must be of nonchildbearing potential History or presence of gastrointestinal, hepatic or renal disease (except for cholecystectomy) Any clinically significant illness, medical or surgical procedure, or trauma within 4 weeks before Period 1 Day 1 Subjects who smoke more than 5 cigarettes or the equivalent in tobacco per day Absolute neutrophil count of less than 2500/mm3 or 2.5 x 109/L Any previous treatment with fostamatinib
